body_html:
Thank you, I was just asking if there is a detailed description about it somewhere, as I don't clearly get it from previous comments.
I have defined loss value by a py_func, and that's why I am overriding the gradient to define the actual gradient of it. Now I don't get what exactly |grad| means and how should I use it. I don't clearly get what you mean by "gradient of some global function with respect to outputs of loss op".

body:
Thank you, I was just asking if there is a detailed description about it somewhere, as I don't clearly get it from previous comments.
I have defined loss value by a py_func, and that's why I am overriding the gradient to define the actual gradient of it. Now I don't get what exactly |grad| means and how should I use it. I don't clearly get what you mean by "gradient of some global function with respect to outputs of loss op".
